
```{r}
#| eval: false
#| filename: 04_script/変数ラベル値ラベル作成.qmd

library(tidyverse)
library(haven)
library(kamaken)


# データ読み込み
result <- 
  tibble(
    year = c(1993, 1991, 1992, 1994:2020),
    path = list.files('01_rawdata/生協調査', full.names = T),
    enc = c(rep('cp932', 22), 
            'utf-8', 'utf-8', 'cp932', 'cp932', 'cp932', 'utf-8', 'cp932', 'cp932'),
    data = map2(path, enc, ~read_sav(.x, encoding = .y))
  )

# ラベルの作成
label <- 
  result %>% 
  mutate(
    varlab = map(data, haven_variable_label),
    vallab = map(data, haven_value_label)
  )


# 書き出し
label %>% 
  select(year, varlab) %>% 
  unnest(varlab) %>% 
  write_excel_csv('02_middle/varlab.csv')
  

label %>% 
  select(year, vallab) %>% 
  unnest(vallab) %>% 
  write_excel_csv('02_middle/vallab.csv')

```
